item.description:
We will have a poker game going and your favorite board game. Poker will be a low buy in. \This is byob and bring a snack to share. Also we will chip in on pizza and garlic bread. Had a lot of laughs the last time. Please email me for my cell its also best to text me /
address 657 West Main St. West Haven < ct
06516 my cell is 203 9884621 /Carolyn

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!
